import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import'./Auth.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setLoading(true);try{const userData=await login(username,password);// –ñ–¥–µ–º, –ø–æ–∫–∞ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è
